org.lightsleep.connection

Class Dbcp

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lightsleep.connection.AbstractConnectionSupplier
      • org.lightsleep.connection.Dbcp
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.function.Supplier<ConnectionWrapper>, ConnectionSupplier

    public class Dbcp
extends AbstractConnectionSupplier
    Gets connection wrappers using Apache Commons DBCP 2. That refer to the following properties of lightsleep.properties file.
     
    References in lightsleep.properties
    Property NameContent
    url The URL of the database to be connected
    usernameThe user name to use when connecting to a database
    passwordThe password to use when connecting to the database
    Other property names Other properties of DBCP 2
    Since:
    1.1.0
    Author:
    Masato Kokubo
